text: Ralph G. Foster (born 25 May 1934 Nottingham, England) is a British athlete and Paralympic Games gold medal winner. After an accident in his late twenties left him a paraplegic he eventually became involved in disabled sports. He was a swimmer, snooker player and lawn bowler. He represented Great Britain in lawn bowling at the 1988 Summer Paralympics in Seoul and won a gold medal. ==See also== *Lawn bowls at the 1988 Summer Paralympics == References == Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Great Britain Category:Paralympic lawn bowls players of Great Britain Category:Sportspeople from Nottingham Category:Lawn bowls players at the 1988 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1988 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in lawn bowls
